title: About Me
text:
I’m a Master’s student in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University, with a background in Economics & Statistics from the University of Edinburgh.
I’m passionate about using data to support smart, strategic decisions — from analyzing supply chains in Power BI to modeling real estate trends in Python. I’ve interned in quantitative research, collaborated across cultures, and worked on projects that bring numbers to life.

title: About Me
text:
🔧 What I’m good at

Data tools: Python, SQL, Power BI
Teamwork across cultures (English, Chinese, some Vietnamese!)
Turning messy info into clear insights & action plans

title: About Me
text:
🌱 Outside the screen
I love exploring new cafes ☕, journaling ideas, and thinking about how data can tell better stories.

Thanks for stopping by! Feel free to get in touch or check out my projects.
